title: Van Heusen Men's BIG FIT Dress Shirts Poplin (Big and Tall)
description: Wrinkle Free: Developed for less wrinkles and easy care
Big Fit: Cut with extra room all around, this comfortable fit features more relaxed armholes and sleeve openings
Point Collar: Classic collar thought to lengthen the face & allows for tie knot variety; can be worn with or without neckwear.
Adjustable Cuff: Two button positions allow for a more customized, improved fit.
Chest Pocket: Classic design holds all your essentials.
For tall fit, search style number 20F9563. For regular fit, search style number 20F7797.
Van Heusen big and tall blended poplin dress shirt.
